name: Project Ronin
description:
With the path of a Samurai relinquished, Ikari must find resolve in following the path of a Ronin.

Preview version

a,d to move around

w/space to jump (you can do it double)

1 - Get sword / x - hide it

2 - Get health potion

3 - Throw bomb

Shift - crouch/guard

tab - inventory

You can send us bugs on this page:

https://bialysztorm.github.io/ronin/
